name: CategoryTheory.Iso.inv_hom_id_apply
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
X Y : C
self : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
inst : CategoryTheory.HasForget C
x : (CategoryTheory.forget C).obj Y
⊢ Eq (self.hom (self.inv x)) x
decl:
attribute [elementwise (attr := simp)] Iso.hom_inv_id Iso.inv_hom_id

initialProofState:
C : Type u

self : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
inst : CategoryTheory.HasForget C
x : (CategoryTheory.forget C).obj X
⊢ Eq (self.inv (self.hom x)) x
decl:
attribute [elementwise (attr := simp)] Iso.hom_inv_id Iso.inv_hom_id

name: CategoryTheory.IsIso.hom_inv_id_apply
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
I : CategoryTheory.IsIso f
inst : CategoryTheory.HasForget C
x : (CategoryTheory.forget C).obj X
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.inv f) (f x)) x
decl:
set_option linter.existingAttributeWarning false in
attribute [elementwise (attr := simp)] IsIso.hom_inv_id IsIso.inv_hom_id

name: CategoryTheory.IsIso.inv_hom_id_apply
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
I : CategoryTheory.IsIso f
inst : CategoryTheory.HasForget C
x : (CategoryTheory.forget C).obj Y
⊢ Eq (f ((CategoryTheory.inv f) x)) x
decl:
set_option linter.existingAttributeWarning false in
attribute [elementwise (attr := simp)] IsIso.hom_inv_id IsIso.inv_hom_id
